sentences.cn: ...一个阴沉且下着细雨的午后。

sentences.en: It has been cloudy and drizzly for days on end.
It was dull and slightly drizzly as we left.
sentences.cn: 我们离开时天阴沉沉地飘着小雨。

sentences.en: That region is drizzly in winter.
sentences.cn: 那个地区冬天常下小雨.

sentences.en: This section of the country is drizzly in the winter.
sentences.cn: 该国的这一地区在冬天经常细雨蒙蒙.

sentences.en: Toward evening, there came a drizzly rain.
sentences.cn: 傍晚那会儿下了一阵小雨.

trans.tran_en: When the weather is drizzly, the sky is dull and grey and it rains steadily but not very hard
